title: Evert Bloemsma - Questions
content:
I am starting to look into his typographic thinking on the net. But the net only catches just so much.

On the other hand, can anybody here point out sources for me to investigate read etc? Does anybody recall type-related conversations they have had with him?

 [‹ Evert Bloemsma passed away over the weekend.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009131153/http:/typophile.com/node/10546 "Go to previous forum topic") [most common repeating character sets ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009131153/http:/typophile.com/node/14621 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin
